FuncDef: This command configures the TTL propagation for locally generated packets which are forwarded over a MPLS LSPs in all VPRN service contexts.

ParaDef.Info: The TTL of the IP packet is not propagated into the VC label or labels in the transport label stack.
The TTL of the IP packet is propagated into the VC label and not into the labels in the transport label stack.
The TTL of the IP packet is propagated into the VC label and all labels in the transport label stack.
